content:
gm, im wondering how hard it would be and what would be the best steps to add component model support to wasmi,
hope this is the right place to ask this question :pray:

Zooming out I'm trying to use this lib https://github.com/DelphinusLab/zkWasm which uses wamsi for execution traces, unfortunately wasmi doesn't support component model yet

GitHub - DelphinusLab/zkWasm
Contribute to DelphinusLab/zkWasm development by creating an account on GitHub.

I think it'd be great to have more independent implementations of the component model! I don't know that much about wasmi, but it looks like they're using https://github.com/paritytech/wasmi/discussions as the place to have general development discussions. That project is independent of Wasmtime and I'm not sure if anyone here will be able to help you with your question.

paritytech/wasmi · Discussions
Explore the GitHub Discussions forum for paritytech wasmi. Discuss code, ask questions & collaborate with the developer community.
Ah, I see this is also being discussed in #general.
Jamey Sharp has marked this topic as resolved.
